name: Accounting Workflow
description:
Create simple accounting app
Develop a intuitive and user-friendly accounting application that provides real-time financial tracking and reporting capabilities for small businesses and individuals. 

The app should allow users to categorize and track income and expenses, automatically generating detailed reports and summaries. 

It should also include features such as:

* Budgeting tools to set financial goals and track progress
* Invoicing and payment processing for customers
* Multi-account support for separate tracking of personal and professional finances
* Integration with popular payment gateways and bank accounts
* Real-time analytics and insights to identify trends and make informed financial decisions

Use simple and intuitive language, with clear and concise navigation and minimal clutter. The app should be accessible on desktop and mobile devices. 

Provide examples of common financial workflows and scenarios, such as:

* Creating and sending invoices to customers
* Tracking expenses for a small business
* Creating and managing a personal budget

Consider the following constraints:

* Compliance with relevant financial regulations and data protection laws
* User data encryption and secure storage
* Adaptability to accommodate future changes in financial regulations and industry standards

Provide detailed steps or guidelines for users to create and manage their accounts, including setup processes, login credentials, and password recovery procedures. 

Offer opportunities for users to provide feedback and suggest improvements, such as a rating system, comment sections, or survey mechanics.
